Description: Papyrus Gardiner I; sheet 7 (seventy-four fragments), two of which are substantial; Hieratic religious text, a 'book of hours', cols. 33-36 (the frame is mis-labelled) and Fragment D.
Curator's comments: Published: R O Faulkner, An ancient Egyptian book of hours - Pap. Brit. Mus. 10569 (Oxford : Printed for the Griffith Institute at the University Press by Charles Batey, 1958).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57271) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57271)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: insect attack, displaced fragments, abraded, loss, fractured Black ink (abraded, loss) Backed: white paper Tabbed: kraft paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: C Curatorial condition comment: incomplete/fragmentary
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Alan Henderson Gardiner
